name: Wearsafe
0:
”Alexa, tell Wearsafe to send an alert.”
”Alexa, ask Wearsafe to check in.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wearsafe
Developer Terms of Use
des: Stay connected with your personal contacts through the Wearsafe network. This skill will extend the non-emergency features of the Wearsafe app to your Alexa device. By linking your Alexa device to Wearsafe, you can send check-ins and non-emergency alerts to your pre-selected family members, caregivers, friends and colleagues with just your voice. During the setup process, please select your home location on the map. This skill supports all voice-enabled Alexa devices. A Wearsafe account is required to use this skill.
